item.description: A quirky space roguelike about a bear in space. Rightfully, Beary Arms is an interstellar; planning; shoot'em up roguelike. Take control of Beary Arms, a space bear, and his comical arsenal of weapons to eliminate his enemies. Plan his route carefully and manage his inventory to get Beary out alive. But bearware, even the smallest of missteps can lead to Beary’s grizzly demise. Planning A core component to Rightfully, Beary Arms is planning.
